desc: Servicing the Flinders Ranges and surrounding areas. 20+ years experience servicing and selling and hiring Mountain Bikes, BMX Bikes, Road Bikes, Scooters, Skateboards, parts and more. Port Augusta's most trusted cycle expert. Stocking the leading brands, Merida, FUJI, SE Bikes, Colony, Division, Academy, Unit & more.

layout.text:
Servicing the Flinders Ranges and surrounding areas.
With over 20 years of experience, you can trust CBR Cycle Garage with all of your cycling needs
